questions.question: What is PHP?
questions.details: PHP (recursive acronym for PHP: Hypertext Preprocessor) is a widely-used open source general-purpose scripting language that is especially suited for web development and can be embedded into HTML.
questions.shortAns: It is an open-source language for web development, embedded in HTML.
